translations: v.<英>强行使分开，撬开；费劲地（从某人）得到（prise sth. out of/from）

phrs.translation: 撬开, 奖赏, 价格, 强行使分开
第二次发酵, 名曰气泡的生成
首先采取, 第一次采取
快速, 正在翻译, 快速决策

sentences.sentence: She used a knife to prise open the lid.
The winner of this year's competition will be awarded a preview of the new fossil hall, as well as a cash prise.
sentences.translation: 今年比赛的获胜者将获得新化石馆的预览机会，还有现金奖励。

sentences.sentence: Neither can it prise donations out of the pockets of anyone unwilling to give them.
sentences.translation: 它也不能从不愿捐款的人的口袋中挖出钱来。
